summary: On the coast of the Gulf of Mexico, the Native American tribe of chief Black Eagle clashes with the Mayan tribe of king Balam.
cast: Yul Brynner|George Chakiris|Shirley Anne Field|Richard Basehart|Brad Dexter|Barry Morse|Armando Silvestre|Leo Gordon|Victoria Vetri|Rudy Solari|Ford Rainey|Angel Di Steffano|José Moreno|James Coburn|Chuck Hayward|José Torvay
keywords: mayan|feud|native american chief|native american war|13th century
title: Los reyes del sol
